website_summaries.verdict: With a sophisticated look, the low-top SeaVees Monterey Standard can be purchased at a budget-friendly price. It is comfortable sneaker with a decent amount of cushioning and support. Its classic style can easily curate a variety of casual outfits for men and women.A bang for the buck, this comfy and on-trend sneaker that can match different casual ensembles. However, people with wider feet may perceive it as narrow in fitting. Others even had to replace theirs with a half or one size up to achieve a comfy fit.
pros: Many wearers were impressed with the squishy comfortable feel the low-top SeaVees Monterey Standard gave
Others said that they felt like they were walking on clouds
A significant number of customers described this low-profile shoe as “super cute,” “great-looking,” “adorable,” “classy,” “suave-looking,” “stylish,” “attractive” and “fabulous.”
It has different and amazing colorways that are lauded by a lot of purchasers
Some wearers noted that the shoe has the right amount of insole support
One mentioned that he no longer needs to place his orthotics
A couple of testers applauded the SeaVees Monterey Standard for having more cushioning and less weight than other Converse shoes
Several SeaVees followers expressed their delight because they receive compliments when they wear stylish sneaker
Aside from its sturdy construction, this trendy shoe is easy to clean as per some of the buyers
When it comes to length, some reviewers noted that it fits true to size
The SeaVees Monterey Standard is available at a budget-friendly rate
Other wearers appreciated its versatile silhouette
A few users stated that the shoe fits the bill for walking or running around town or traveling
cons: Several testers with wider feet perceived the shoe to be narrow in fitting
A few users mentioned that the footwear felt a bit stiff out of the box
The back part of the shoe is hard and rubs around the ankle as complained by some wearers

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing, fit PERFECT. Zero complaints, am now a lifelong customer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, these look amazing too. I'm normally a size 10.5" but recently I've been buying shoes in 10" as it seems most companies are sizing larger (maybe because we're all getting so fat). However, SeaVees keeps it true to size, absolute perfect fit. I'm 6'1", slim build (180lbs), average sized feet (not average elsewhere, if you know what I mean ;))
customer_reviews.author: SONNNKK

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying this because I own the baja slip on, and that was tight and took a lot of adjustment time. But these are extremely comfortable, and with the lacing you can tighten it up to comfort. I have kind of wide feet, but no problems. Overall, I like my SeaVees much more than comparable Vans, and at this point, not sure why I'd ever buy Vans again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Seavees in a different color and style. This particular pair is great for wearing with shorts, or jeans and the non marking gum soles are good for boating and provide traction. Comfortable with no socks and breathable with the vent holes. They'll look even better as they get miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: mkh75

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long time wearer of Seavees and have usually gone with the slip ons or the Hermosa Plimsolls. I've always appreciated the style and quality. This is my first Monterey purchase and I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: A & K

customer_reviews.title: Non supportive insole Side to Side Foot Movement Difficult Lacing
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these shoes for someone who needs any type of arch support. The inner and outer edges wore as if I owned these shoes for several years. that tells me that my foot was moving side to side too much and not stable. the lacing is also tight and hard to manage. I have a similar fashion sneaker in the Vans brand that does have a good insole and does not cause the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: CACTUS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable EDS (Every Day Shoe)
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance because these were on sale for leas than $30. Very comfortable everyday shoe, I added insole to help minimal padding. More comfortable than vans. I would and will buy again, especially if they go on sale for less than $30.00 again.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fit and look are great but they have started squeaking loudly after only 2 months of wear
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes that look good, if a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes, but they are a little narrow. If you have slightly wider feet go up a 1/2 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Carbaugh

customer_reviews.title: A distinct ridge in the sole rendered it unwearable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes so badly! Unfortunately, there was a ridge in the sole that felt like I was constantly stepping on a raised concrete seam. The soles weren't replaceable without damaging the shoe, so I had to send them back. I can only imagine a masochist would enjoy wearing these stylish but uncomfortable shoes. I wish there were a higher quality option when it comes to sneakers/plimsoles like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sjogren

customer_reviews.title: I Am A Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. I went through 3 other companies trying to find a shoes like this pair. Will stay with SeeVeas.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Nice, stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some SeaVees for a little while. Expectations were not disappointed, but do not underestimate the difficulty of keep WHITE canvas shoes clean. Unfortunately this is nearly a one season type use, unless the washer machine becomes a viable option. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and stylish !!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this everyday, the insole is very soft and good looking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Socks are needed
customer_reviews.text: You simply can’t wear these shoes without socks because they will hurt your heel. I was literally suffering and in pain when I wore them without socks.
customer_reviews.author: nicolas

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love them so much! Fit perfectly! They are Comfortable and look awesome! The insoles are removable and the quality of the sneaker Is spot on. I like it! Will continue buying them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tito A.

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Definitely too narrow in the toe box in particular. Agree with other reviews- go 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing casual sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: Summer summer. Ideal casual shoes to any time w shorts or pants. To dress anytime a really fresh shoes. Lightweight
customer_reviews.author: manu

customer_reviews.title: Not military green
customer_reviews.text: The shoes that I received are not military green. They do not look like the picture on Amazon. They are a very dark green. If you are looking for something that is truly Olive drab, I would suggest that you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: True To Self

product_meta.title: Seavees Men's Monterey Sneaker Standard
product_meta.description: There's no mistaking the clean and sleek lines of the Monterey Standard sneaker! Durable canvas uppers with a round toe. Lace-up closure for a secure fit. Soft and breathable washed cotton canvas linings. Vent holes at medial side for increased airflow. Features a perforated contoured footbed that provides cooling and airflow for a comfortable wear. Molded SeaVees logo on lateral side midsole. Textured toe bumper and durable midsole. Dual compound outsole offers cushioning for a soft ride while providing maximum grip and long lasting wearability. SeaVees recommends these to be worn with no-show socks. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Uppers of heavy weight washed canvas
Comfort memory foam footbed lined in soft cotton featuring cooling air flow channels
Genuine gum rubber outsole for flexibility, longer wear and softer step
